subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: After an engine mishap at Daytona early in the Nascar season, Jeff Gordon has needed 20 races to get back into the race for the circuit’s postseason tournament.
snippet: After an engine mishap at Daytona early in the Nascar season, Jeff Gordon has needed 20 races to get back into the race for the circuit’s postseason tournament.
